ðŸ“– Summary: Cariddi is a Go-based tool designed for comprehensive web reconnaissance. It crawls domains to discover URLs and scans them for sensitive information such as API keys, secrets, file extensions, and endpoints. It supports various installation methods and offers extensive scan customization options.
